trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: If the swarm has a {@variantrule Climb Speed|XPHB}, the swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) Poison damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) Poison damage if the swarm is {@status Bloodied|XPHB}.
